content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 (12 ounce) package thin egg noodles" )

content.text: 0) In a large pot over medium heat, cook chicken pieces in oil until browned on both sides.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cook"@36:40 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chicken pieces"@41:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@59:62 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until browned on both sides"@63:90 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@6:17 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@23:34 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in onion and cook 2 minutes more.
2) Pour in water and chicken bouillon and bring to a boil.
4) Stir in celery, carrots, garlic, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "celery"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "carrots"@19:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "garlic"@28:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt and pepper"@36:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Simmer until carrots are just tender.
6) Remove chicken pieces and pull the meat from the bone.
7) Stir the noodles into the pot and cook until tender, 10 minutes.
8) Return chicken meat to pot just before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Return"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken meat"@10:22 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-8-0 "pot"@26:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( cond-8-0 "before serving"@35:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
